name: Intergalactic Goblin Ramming Speed!
description:
Lost in a pocket of time, a generic space ship from 2XXX has somehow found itself lost in a goblin's dungeon. This isn't your conventional RPG since this sci-fi vehicle doesn't exactly play by the rules!

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space Bar - Dash to mouse position

Esc - Pause

Created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 41 competition with the theme 'Combine 2 Incompatible Genres'.
